content: canyon moon rising crochet pattern by susan kennedy of pretty peaceful https //www ravelry com/designers/susan-e-kennedy @prettypeacefulcrochet on instagram pretty peaceful on facebook pretty peaceful youtube video tutorials size about 40 by 62 inches 101 6 by 157 5 cm you can make a wider blanket by adding 38 stitches 1 star pattern repeat or any multiple of 38 stitches to the foundation row you can make a narrower blanket by decreasing your starting chain by 38 stitches repeat row 2-22 as many times as you like to adjust the length of the blanket the blanket is 4 stars wide and 6 stars tall as written video tutorial https //youtu be/9ugpv_rdbcu yarn light dk or light worsted weight yarn light category 3 you will need 1 660 yards 1 518 meters of main color yarn mc the mc yarn is what makes the moon shapes you will need 900 yards 823 meters of contrast color yarn cc the cc yarn creates the star shapes canyon moon rising crochet pattern © 2025 by susan kennedy of pretty peaceful the sample blanket used 3 cakes of lion brand mandala yarn in andorian 100% acrylic 590 yards 540 m per 150-gram cake as the main color mc and 2 cakes of lion bran mandala yarn in chimera as the contrast color cc buy the lion brand mandala yarn in andorian for the main color from lion brand on amazon here https //amzn to/4kvhvds you will need 3 cakes sometimes the 3-pack is cheaper https //amzn to/41pxbgp buy the lion brand mandala yarn in chimera for the contrast color from lion brand on amazon here https //amzn to/4iwegw7 you will need 2 cakes sometimes the 3-pack is a better deal https //amzn to/4izw4cc the sample blanket let the mandala colors flow without cutting the yarn or switching the order of the colors you can use any yarn you like feel free to use up partial skeins or scraps be aware that your blanket may be larger or smaller than the dimensions listed here if you use a different yarn or hook size use the hook size recommended on the yarn label if your carried yarn
